name: Bob's Missing 2017
description:
(There are some violence and maybe some content slightly unsuitable to some players)

Bob's Missing is a game where you search around the city for little hints written on the list. The enemies around are dangerous when in close proximity but some places will lead you to different locations and some locations will have sudden endings or another secret place soon to be discovered. Some of these places or enemies that will catch you or take you to some places will probably lead you to Bob as well.

There numerous locations to discover and to see especially in the 15 to 20 Square Kilometres of the world to explore. Have fun and enjoy
